verses.verse: Now <WG1161> concerning the things <WG4012> whereof <WG3739> ye wrote <WG1125>: <WG3427> It is good <WG2570> for a man <WG444> not <WG3361> to touch <WG680> a woman <WG1135>.

But <WG1223>, because of fornications <WG4202>, let each man <WG1538> have <WG2192> his own <WG1438> wife <WG1135>, and <WG2532> let each woman <WG1538> have <WG2192> her own <WG2398> husband <WG435>.
Let the husband <WG435> render <WG591> unto the wife <WG1135> her due <WG3784>: <WG2133> and <WG1161> likewise <WG3668> also <WG2532> the wife <WG1135> unto the husband <WG435>.

The wife <WG1135> hath <WG1850> not <WG3756> power <WG1850> over her own <WG2398> body <WG4983>, but <WG235> the husband <WG435>: and <WG1161> likewise <WG3668> also <WG2532> the husband <WG435> hath <WG1850> not <WG3756> power <WG1850> over his own <WG2398> body <WG4983>, but <WG235> the wife <WG1135>.

Defraud ye <WG650> not <WG3361> one the other <WG240>, except5100, Leviticus2 it be by <WG1537> consent <WG4859> for <WG4314> a season <WG2540>, that <WG2443> ye may give yourselves <WG4980> unto3521, 2532 prayer <WG4335>, and <WG2532> may be together1909, 846 again <WG3825>, that <WG2443> Satan <WG4567> tempt <WG3985> you <WG5209> not <WG3361> because <WG1223> of your <WG5216> incontinency <WG192>.
But <WG1161> this <WG5124> I say <WG3004> by <WG2596> way of concession <WG4774>, not <WG3756> of <WG2596> commandment <WG2003>.

Yet <WG1063> I would <WG2309> that all <WG3956> men <WG444> were <WG1511> even <WG2532> as <WG5613> I myself <WG1683>. Howbeit <WG235> each man <WG1538> hath <WG2192> his <WG2398> own gift <WG5486> from <WG1537> God <WG2316>, one3739, Ezekiel3 after this manner <WG3779>, and <WG1161> another <WG3739> after that <WG3779>.
But <WG1161> I say <WG3004> to the unmarried <WG22> and <WG2532> to widows <WG5503>, It is <WG2076> good <WG2570> for them <WG846> if <WG1437> they abide <WG3306> even <WG5613> as I <WG2504>.
But <WG1161> if <WG1487> they <WG1467> have not <WG3756> continency <WG1467>, let them marry <WG1060>: for <WG1063> it is <WG2076> better <WG2908> to marry <WG1060> than <WG2228> to burn <WG4448>.

But <WG1161> unto the married <WG1060> I give charge <WG3853>, yea not <WG3756> I <WG1473>, but <WG235> the Lord <WG2962>, That the wife <WG1135> depart <WG5563> not <WG3361> from <WG575> her husband <WG435>

(but1161, 2532 should <WG1437> she depart <WG5563>, let her remain <WG3306> unmarried <WG22>, or <WG2228> else be reconciled <WG2644> to her husband <WG435>); and2532, 863 that the husband <WG435> leave <WG863> not <WG3361> his wife <WG1135>.

But <WG1161> to the rest <WG3062> say <WG3004> I <WG1473>, not <WG3756> the Lord <WG2962>: If any <WG5100> brother <WG80> hath <WG2192> an unbelieving <WG571> wife <WG1135>, and <WG2532> she <WG846> is content <WG4909> to dwell <WG3611> with <WG3326> him <WG863>, let him <WG846> not <WG3361> leave <WG863> her <WG846>.

And <WG2532> the woman <WG1135> that <WG3748> hath <WG2192> an unbelieving <WG571> husband <WG435>, and <WG2532> he <WG846> is content <WG4909> to dwell <WG3611> with <WG3326> her <WG846>, let her <WG863> not <WG3361> leave <WG863> her husband <WG846>.

For <WG1063> the unbelieving <WG571> husband <WG435> is sanctified <WG37> in <WG1722> the wife <WG1135>, and <WG2532> the unbelieving <WG571> wife <WG1135> is sanctified <WG37> in <WG1722> the brother <WG435>: else686, 1893 were <WG2076> your <WG5216> children <WG5043> unclean <WG169>; but <WG1161> now <WG3568> are they <WG2076> holy <WG40>.

Yet <WG1161> if <WG1487> the unbelieving <WG571> departeth <WG5563>, let him depart <WG5563>: the brother <WG80> or <WG2228> the sister <WG79> is <WG3756> not <WG3756> under bondage <WG1402> in <WG1722> such <WG5108> cases <WG1161>: but God <WG2316> hath called <WG2564> us <WG2248> in <WG1722> peace <WG1515>.

For <WG1063> how <WG5101> knowest thou <WG1492>, O wife <WG1135>, whether <WG1487> thou shalt save <WG4982> thy husband <WG435>? Or <WG2228> how <WG5101> knowest thou <WG1492>, O husband <WG435>, whether <WG1487> thou shalt save <WG4982> thy wife <WG1135>?

Only <WG1487>, <WG3361> as <WG5613> the Lord <WG2316> hath distributed <WG3307> to each man <WG1538>, as <WG5613> God <WG2962> hath called <WG2564> each <WG1538>, so <WG3779> let him walk <WG4043>. And <WG2532> so <WG3779> ordain I <WG1299> in <WG1722> all <WG3956> the churches <WG1577>.

Was <WG2564> any man <WG5100> called <WG2564> being circumcised <WG4059>? Let him <WG1986> not <WG3361> become uncircumcised <WG1986>. Hath <WG2564> any <WG5100> been called <WG2564> in <WG1722> uncircumcision <WG203>? Let him <WG4059> not <WG3361> be circumcised <WG4059>.
Circumcision <WG4061> is <WG2076> nothing <WG3762>, and <WG2532> uncircumcision <WG203> is <WG2076> nothing <WG3762>; but <WG235> the keeping <WG5084> of the commandments <WG1785> of God <WG2316>.
Let each man <WG1538> abide <WG3306> in <WG1722> that calling <WG2821> wherein1722, 3739 he was called <WG2564>.

Wast thou called <WG2564> being a bondservant <WG1401>? Care <WG3199> not <WG3361> for it <WG4671>: nay <WG235>, even if1487, 2532 thou canst <WG1410> become <WG1096> free <WG1658>, use <WG5530> it rather <WG3123>.

For <WG1063> he that <WG3588> was called <WG2564> in <WG1722> the Lord <WG2962> being a bondservant <WG1401>, is <WG2076> the Lord <WG2962>'s freedman <WG558>: likewise3668, 2532 he that <WG3588> was called <WG2564> being free <WG1658>, is <WG2076> Christ <WG5547>'s bondservant <WG1401>.
Ye <WG1096> were bought <WG59> with a price <WG5092>; become <WG1096> not <WG3361> bondservants <WG1401> of men <WG444>.
Brethren <WG80>, let each man <WG1538>, wherein1722, 3739 he was called <WG2564>, therein1722, 5129 abide <WG3306> with <WG3844> God <WG2316>.

Now <WG1161> concerning <WG4012> virgins <WG3933> I have <WG2192> no <WG3756> commandment <WG2003> of the Lord <WG2962>: but <WG1161> I give <WG1325> my judgment <WG1106>, as <WG5613> one that hath obtained mercy <WG1653> of <WG5259> the Lord <WG2962> to be <WG1511> trustworthy <WG4103>.

I think <WG3767> therefore <WG3767> that this <WG5124> is <WG5225> good <WG2570> by <WG1223> reason of the distress <WG318> that is <WG5225> upon <WG1764> us <WG3754>, namely, that it is good <WG2570> for a man <WG444> to be as he is <WG1511>.
Art thou bound <WG1210> unto a wife <WG1135>? Seek <WG2212> not <WG3361> to be loosed <WG3080>. Art thou loosed <WG3089> from <WG575> a wife <WG1135>? Seek <WG2212> not <WG3361> a wife <WG1135>.

But1161, 2532 shouldest <WG1437> thou marry <WG1060>, thou hast <WG264> not <WG3756> sinned <WG264>; and <WG2532> if <WG1437> a virgin <WG3933> marry <WG1060>, she hath <WG264> not <WG3756> sinned <WG264>. Yet <WG1161> such <WG5108> shall have <WG2192> tribulation <WG2347> in the flesh <WG4561>: and <WG1161> I <WG1473> would spare <WG5339> you <WG5216>.

But <WG1161> this <WG5124> I say <WG5346>, brethren <WG80>, the time <WG4958> is shortened <WG3588>, that <WG2532> henceforth <WG2076> both <WG3588> those that <WG2192> have <WG1135> wives <WG5613> may be as <WG3361> though <WG5600> they had <WG5600> none <WG2443>;

and <WG2532> those <WG3588> that weep <WG2799>, as though <WG5613> they <WG3588> wept <WG2799> not <WG3361>; and <WG2532> those that rejoice <WG5463>, as though <WG5613> they <WG3588> rejoiced <WG5463> not <WG3361>; and <WG2532> those that buy <WG59>, as though <WG5613> they possessed <WG2722> not <WG3361>;

and <WG2532> those <WG3588> that use <WG5530> the <WG5129> world <WG2889>, as <WG5613> not <WG3361> using <WG2710> it to the full <WG1063>: for the fashion <WG4976> of this <WG5127> world <WG2889> passeth away <WG3855>.

But <WG1161> I would have <WG2309> you <WG5209> to be free from cares <WG275>. He <WG3588> that is <WG1511> unmarried <WG22> is careful for <WG3309> the things <WG3588> of the Lord <WG2962>, how <WG4459> he may please <WG700> the Lord <WG2962>:
but <WG1161> he <WG3588> that is married <WG1060> is careful for <WG3309> the things <WG3588> of the world <WG2889>, how <WG4459> he may please <WG700> his wife <WG1135>,

and is divided <WG3307>. So also the woman <WG1135> that is unmarried <WG22> and <WG2532> the virgin <WG3933> is careful for <WG3309> the things <WG3588> of the Lord <WG2962>, that <WG2443> she may be <WG5600> holy <WG40> both <WG2532> in body <WG4983> and <WG2532> in spirit <WG4151>: but <WG1161> she <WG3588> that is married <WG1060> is careful for <WG3309> the things <WG3588> of the world <WG2889>, how <WG4459> she may please <WG700> her husband <WG435>.

And <WG1161> this <WG5124> I say <WG3004> for <WG4314> your <WG5216> own <WG846> profit <WG4851>; not <WG3756> that <WG2443> I may cast <WG1911> a snare <WG1029> upon you <WG5213>, but <WG235> for <WG4314> that which is seemly <WG2158>, and <WG2532> that ye may attend upon <WG2145> the Lord <WG2962> without distraction <WG563>.

But <WG1161> if <WG1487> any man <WG5100> thinketh <WG3543> that <WG3739> he behaveth <WG807> himself <WG846> unseemly <WG807> toward <WG1909> his virgin <WG3933> daughter <WG1437>, if she be past <WG5600> the flower of <WG5230> her age <WG5230>, and <WG2532> if need <WG3784> so <WG3779> requireth <WG1096>, let him do <WG4160> what he will <WG2309>; he sinneth <WG264> not <WG3756>; let them marry <WG1060>.

But <WG1161> he that <WG3739> standeth <WG2476> stedfast <WG1476> in <WG1722> his heart <WG2588>, having <WG2192> no <WG3361> necessity <WG318>, but <WG1161> hath <WG2192> power <WG1849> as touching <WG4012> in his <WG846> own <WG2398> heart <WG2307>, to keep <WG5083> his <WG1438> own virgin <WG3933> daughter <WG4160>, shall do well <WG2476>.

So <WG5620> then <WG2532> both he <WG3588> that giveth <WG1547> his own virgin daughter in marriage <WG1547> doeth <WG4160> well <WG2573>; and <WG1161> he <WG3588> that giveth <WG1547> her not <WG3361> in marriage <WG1547> shall do <WG4160> better <WG2908>.

A wife <WG1135> is bound <WG1210> for so <WG1909> long <WG5550> time as <WG1909> her <WG846> husband <WG435> liveth <WG2198>; but <WG1161> if <WG1437> the <WG846> husband <WG435> be dead <WG2837>, she is <WG2076> free <WG1658> to <WG1060> be married to <WG1060> whom <WG3739> she will <WG2309>; only <WG3440> in <WG1722> the Lord <WG2962>.

But <WG1161> she is <WG2076> happier <WG3107> if <WG1437> she <WG3306> abide <WG3306> as <WG3779> she is <WG2596>, after my <WG1699> judgment <WG1106>: and <WG1161> I <WG2504> think <WG1380> that I also <WG2504> have <WG2192> the Spirit <WG4151> of God <WG2316>.
